meanings.definition: A metal or plastic device attached to a bicycle pedal to prevent the foot from slipping off.
meanings.sent1: I bought a new bike with a toeclip to keep my foot secure while riding.
meanings.sent2: The toeclip on my pedal helps me maintain a steady grip while cycling.
meanings.sent3: My friend thought the toeclip on the pedal was a tiny foot trap!
meanings.sent4: The toeclip acted like a safety net, ensuring my foot stayed in place.
meanings.sent5: The shiny toeclip gleamed in the sunlight, reminding me of its purpose.

meanings.definition: To attach a toeclip to a bicycle pedal.
meanings.sent1: I need to toeclip the new pedals on my bike for a better grip.
meanings.sent2: She carefully toeclips the device onto the pedal to secure her foot.
meanings.sent3: He tried to toeclip the toeclip, but it kept slipping out of place!
meanings.sent4: The mechanic expertly toeclips the toeclip, ensuring it stays put.
meanings.sent5: Remember to toeclip the toeclip tightly to avoid any accidents.
